WebSocket Server for TX Text Control HTML5 Document Editor

WebSocket Server for TX Text Control HTML5 Document Editor for Angular and Node.js.

dataContainer.js

This file contains the definition of the class DataContainer which represents messages exchanged betwenn the client and the server.

serverCommandID.js

This file contains the ServerCommandID enumeration containing some command / message IDs of server or browser messages which have to be processed inside the module.
